title: Constructivist and Imagination-Based Virtual Learning Environment (VLE) Design: Application in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Designing a mathematics learning environment that integrates constructivism and imaginative education in a VR/simulation setting using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can visually and interactively explore mathematical concepts in VR-based simulations.
Learners develop mathematical problem-solving strategies through collaboration with peers using a constructivist approach.

Learners transform three real-world workplace problems into mathematical models (equations, graphs, statistical analysis) using imagination-based educational techniques (brainstorming, analogical thinking) and write a project report proposing solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
